name: Automaton (itch) (mestiez)
description:
A  little puzzle game that requires the player to devise a ruleset to satisfy the constraints set by the level. Cells display their neighbour count.  Automaton rules are executed on the same copy of the grid, meaning that their order doesn't matter.

Scroll inside the game window to see the level selection menu.

Note that progress will not be saved if your browser is configured to reject access to localStorage from an iframe.

I've made 19 levels so far.
